profile_positions.description: As IT project manager I work for Maastricht University's Marketing and Communication department. I lead people such as DevOps teams, external IT companies and freelancers who execute software projects for and with employees of different faculties and service centres. In this role I initiate, plan and oversee the execution of small (10k - 40k) and medium size (>100k) projects. In my projects I focus primarily on the use of new technologies (such as cloud services, artificial intelligence, and virtual as well as augmented reality) and how to utilise them to effectively and lastingly meet the organisations business and strategic goals. As a trained technician, I combine in-depth technical and design knowledge with leadership and talend-building experience.
profile_positions.title: Digital Innovation Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
The School of Business and Economics strives for international excellence in research and education. It is among the most prestigious business schools worldwide with a Triple Crown accreditation (only 1% of all business schools worldwide have it). In my role as online content manager I identify, analyse, develop and integrate online communication tools. Within the Marketing and Communication department I am working on the realisation of the schools branding and marketing goals.

• Developing online communication policies and social media marketing strategies
• Executing technical tasks for various web related projects
• Coordination of in-house audiovisual content productions and live event coverage
• Implementation of online and social media marketing campaigns and analytics
• Creating online promotional content for blogs, newsletters and websites
• Overseeing online advertisement campaigns and traffic management
• Documenting workflows, proceedures and service updates
profile_positions.title: Online Content Manager

profile_positions.description:
Pendo (www.pendo.cc) is a Social Exchange Platform founded in 2014. It's mission is to facilitates social capital in a cooperative economy. It does so by providing a financial instrument that empowers individuals and communities to exchange their talents and wealth outside the monetary domain. As a start-up it belongs to the Financial Technology (Fintech) sector. 

• Ideation and prototyping of the concept (Fintech retail business)
• Complete realization; back-end web development and UI design
• Business concept and revenue model development
• Marketing research and engagement strategy creation
• Project management and strategic partnership program implementation
profile_positions.title: Founder and Chief Executive Officer (CEO)

profile_positions.description:
From the start I provide clients with handcrafted digital solutions for their marketing, advertisement or branding challenges. My service includes the production, development, design and execution of a wide range of media types and communication/growth hacking strategies. As a one-man-full-service agency I enjoy intricate and novel business challenges. In recent years I do also offer consultancy and project management services. For a full list of my portfolio and experience don't hesitate to contact me.

Digital Production:
• Audiovisual media production and digital story telling
• Digital compositing and animation
• Front-End web development
• User interaction and experience design
• Tablet publishing and e-Book developing
• Mobile applications development (iOS)


Consultancy and Project Management:
• IT change management 
• Online Marketing and digital sales consultancy
• Online advertisment campaign management 
• Search engine optimisation and growth hacking
profile_positions.title: Senior Digital Design Engineer and Solution Developer

profile_positions.description:
The European Journalism Centre (www.ejc.net) is a non profit training institute for mid-career journalist based in Maastricht. It enables and sustains quality journalism and information as a public service through a variety of activities, both in the non-profit and service sectors. By offering workshops, skills trainings, research and consultancy services and online collaborative working spaces for professionals it aims to promote journalistic integrity and democratic values. 

• Setup and supervision of all audiovisual productions
• Pre-, pro- and post-production of audiovisual learning material, reports and documentaries
• Creation of graphical identities and design elements
• Management of online streaming platforms
• Maintenance of in-house audiovisual equipment and acquisition of new equipment
• Planning of seminars and training courses on video journalism
• Consultation work for associates and partners on audiovisual production
profile_positions.title: Assistant Producer and Senior Producer

profile_positions.description:
During this brief role I was responsible for Timm Ringewaldt’s installation “Praxiscop” and production of the “Steirischer Herbst 06” festival documentary. I installed and maintained "Praxiscope"  a digital public animation trick-table as part of a 90-minute documentary production. This was part of a month long Art and Culture event organized by the city of Graz in Austria. 

• Programming of MAX/MSP and Jitter application for the “Praxiscope”
• Developing of the shooting schedule according to script
• Production assistant and shooting on location
• Editing material for local TV station and online
• Encoding of appropriate formats and quality control
• Management of online video content
profile_positions.title: Assistant Media Producer

profile_positions.description:
As production assistant I was responsible for a variety of tasks that ensured the proper execution of the shooting. Written and directed by Laura Noebauer, the shortmovie “Glueck” won the Shorts on Screen award 2006. Subsequently screened at Diagonale 07, Videodance Thesseloniki 07, Crossing Europe 07 and Shorts & Skirts ORF 07 the six-minute movie was shot in High Definition near Salzburg with a team of 20 people.

• Scheduling all team and staff 
• Coordination and organisation of third parties
• Outlining of production plans
• Creation of individual timetables
• Trouble shooting on location
profile_positions.title: Production Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Droneberger Schowtechnik (www.droneberger.at) is a company based in Klagenfurt, Austria. This apprenticeship of six months involved the construction of event stages for 20.000 people including light and sound installations for a variety of show events.

• Setup of the stage and the frame
• Installation of professional lightning equipment
• Securing the construction according to manual
• Installation of the sound system
• Realisation of in-show lightning 
• Deconstruction of the set
• Maintaining the warehouse
• Fixing minor cable problems
profile_positions.title: Assistant Technical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Korea University (www.korea.edu) is among the oldest, largest and top-ranked universities in South Korea with a campus of 35.000 students. During my semester abroad I became a member of the Korean University Television Network. The Korea University Television Network shares a studio and TV station equipped with various cameras, transmission room, satellite broadcasting system, and editing equipment on the university’s main campus. For educational and non-profit purposes students and professionals produce broadcast news, entertainment programmes, varsity games, academic debates and debates. 

• Production of a promotional videos
• Recording of interviews with staff members and students
• Editing of the material (HD)
• Animation and compositing 
• Voice recording and mastering
profile_positions.title: TV Foreign Producer

profile_positions.description:
Sonicflow (www.sonicflow.at) is a sound engineering studio owned by Wolfgang Schrammel. During my internship I worked on a variety of projects and learned the crafts of sound engineering.


• Recording and manipulation of speakers and instruments
• Familiarization with the broad technical repertoire of the profession
• Microphoning, mixing and mastering of single voices, choirs and a variety of instrument
• Production of advertisement spots primarily for radio
• Production of sampler tracks for individuals, band recordings and musicians for compact disk (CD)
• Live sound mixing on a variety of events, including classical concerts and church choir. 
• Working with sequencer software packages for production (ProTools and Nuendo)
profile_positions.title: Assistant Sound Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Elektro Stotz is a small company specialised in-house electrical setups for living spaces and companies. It is owned by Josef Stotz who is also its director. My apprenticeship took place during the last two years of the Higher Technological Institute for Informatics and Telecommunication Technologies

• Execution of in-house wiring
• Failure finding in electric circuits
• Construction of power distributors
• Installation of electronic household devices
profile_positions.title: Assistant Electrical Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description: In this work I helped the organisation to collect money for humanitarian causes largely in the South of Germany.

In this role I did street interviews to create awareness of health issues and collected donations. It was an exciting but challenging work where I meet a lot of new people and learned a lot about social responsibility and field work.
